name: Island Dream
description:
You are a survivor.

Your plane has crashed and you have been lost to society! Stranded on a series of desert islands, you must solve simple puzzles and build a boat to leave the islands and find your way back to the world. Find materials to progress across the islands and achieve this goal!

Move: arrow keys

Action: F

Skip dialogue: Space

Reset level: R

Programming: Yasmin, Dasha, Iain, Noel, Pete

Art: Noel, Yasmin, Iain

Sound: Pete

Puzzles, dialogue and concepts: Callum
